parts.text: {"word":"contentarse","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"pronominal","definition":"満足する、我慢する、甘んじる","english_definition":"to be satisfied, to be content, to make do with","examples":[{"sentence":"Tuvo que contentarse con un trabajo mal pagado.","translation":"彼は薄給の仕事に甘んじなければならなかった。"},{"sentence":"No me contento con esto, quiero más.","translation":"私はこれに満足しない、もっと欲しい。"},{"sentence":"Tendremos que contentarnos con lo que tenemos.","translation":"私たちは持っているもので満足しなければならないだろう。"}],"collocations":["contentarse con poco (少しのことで満足する)","contentarse con lo que uno tiene (自分の持っているもので満足する)"],"synonyms":["satisfacerse","conformarse","resignarse","acomodarse"],"antonyms":["descontentarse","insatisfacerse","rebelarse"],"conjugation":{"present":{"yo":"me contento","tú":"te contentas","él/ella/usted":"se contenta","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentáis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentan"},"preterite":{"yo":"me contenté","tú":"te contentaste","él/ella/usted":"se contentó","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentasteis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentaron"},"imperfect":{"yo":"me contentaba","tú":"te contentabas","él/ella/usted":"se contentaba","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentábamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentabais","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentaban"},"future":{"yo":"me contentaré","tú":"te contentarás","él/ella/usted":"se contentará","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentaremos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentaréis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentarán"},"conditional":{"yo":"me contentaría","tú":"te contentarías","él/ella/usted":"se contentaría","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentaríamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentaríais","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentarían"},"subjunctive_present":{"yo":"me contente","tú":"te contentes","él/ella/usted":"se contente","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentemos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentéis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contenten"},"subjunctive_imperfect":{"yo":"me contentara/me contentase","tú":"te contentaras/te contentases","él/ella/usted":"se contentara/se contentase","nosotros/nosotras":"nos contentáramos/nos contentásemos","vosotros/vosotras":"os contentarais/os contentaseis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se contentaran/se contentasen"},"imperative":{"tú":"conténtate","usted":"conténtese","nosotros/nosotras":"contentémonos","vosotros/vosotras":"contentaos","ustedes":"conténtense"}}},"etymology":{"value":"Del verbo 'contentar' (satisfacer) + el pronombre reflexivo 'se'.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kon.tenˈtaɾ.se/","syllables":"con-ten-tar-se"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Contentarse' is a pronominal verb, meaning it requires a reflexive pronoun (me, te, se, nos, os, se). It expresses the idea of accepting something less than ideal or being satisfied with what one has, often in the absence of something better. It can also imply a sense of resignation or making the best of a situation.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ Contento con la comida.","correct":"✓ Me contento con la comida.","note":"The reflexive pronoun is necessary. 'Me contento' means 'I am contenting myself' or 'I am making do' with the food."},{"incorrect":"✗ No contento.","correct":"✓ No me contento.","note":"Again, the reflexive pronoun is essential. 'No me contento' means 'I am not content' or 'I am not making do'."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["contento (adjective: satisfied, happy)","contento (noun: satisfaction, contentment)","contentar (verb: to satisfy)","contentamiento (noun: contentment, satisfaction)"],"phrases":["más vale pájaro en mano que ciento volando (a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush - similar idea of being content with what you have)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"level":"B1","frequency_corpus":"Appears frequently in spoken and written Spanish.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Contentarse' is a verb that means to be satisfied with something, often when it's not perfect. It's used when you have to accept something because you can't get something better. Remember that it's a pronominal verb, so you need to use 'me', 'te', 'se', 'nos', 'os', or 'se' before the verb. For example, 'Me contento con este trabajo' means 'I am content with this job' (even if it's not the best job)."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Después de buscar mucho, se contentó con el primer apartamento que encontró.","translation":"After searching a lot, he/she was satisfied with the first apartment he/she found.","type":"example","meaning_category":"satisfaction"},{"sentence":"Aunque no era lo que quería, me contenté con el resultado.","translation":"Although it wasn't what I wanted, I was content with the result.","type":"example","meaning_category":"acceptance"},{"sentence":"No te contentes con menos de lo que mereces.","translation":"Don't settle for less than you deserve.","type":"example","meaning_category":"advice"}]}
